Name: Jeramie
description:
Jeramie is 24 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by farming seaweed in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy seaweed and other materials for her business.

She earns additional income from furniture making.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.
